about_the_game:
Welcome to the world where only the bravest and most dexterous can survive! "Walking Steel" features exciting battles, strategic battles and powerful enemies. Control powerful tanks, upgrade them and fight for your survival in constant danger.

Game Features:
- Epic Tank Battles: Take part in dynamic battles where every decision can be decisive.
- Improve your equipment: Collect points for destroyed tanks and upgrade your tank to become invincible on the battlefield.
- World of Survival: Explore dangerous areas, find shelters and fight enemies to stay alive.
Are you ready to take on the challenge and prove that you are the best tanker? Join "Tank Survival" and immerse yourself in a new and dangerous world!

Are you ready to take on the challenge and prove that you are the best tanker? Join "Tank Survival" and immerse yourself in a new and dangerous world!
name: Walking Steel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 Compatible
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Fight epic tank battles, upgrade your vehicles and survive in dangerous conditions. Explore the world, find resources and fight enemies to become the best tanker. Join "Walking Steel" and prove your strength and tactics on the battlefield!
